The compleat vineyard, or, A most excellent way for the planting of vines not onely according to the German and French way, but also long experimented in England : wherein are set forth the whole circumstances necessary for the planting a vineyard ... / by William Hughes. Hughes, William, fl. 1665-1683.
[8], 27 p.
Printed by G.M. for W. Crooke ... and John Playfere ..., London : 1665.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
